Marlien

Marlien is a magical Creation within the Great Beyond which was constructed by the Dead Gods.

Names

Marlien is known by many names:

  • Marlien - from the parable of Solen and Marlien in the Arthalean religion Solenist Academia, where it is the name of the creator, or sleeping godess who dreams creation.

Topography

Marlien is a poly-dimensional Creation whose structure can be divided into three, discrete depths: Astral, Ethereal, and Material.

Like many Creations, Marlien is divided into a number of Planes, each having disparate topographies with some overlap, intersection, and imitation.
